author: eosfor

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body:
Just to confirm: not all completions are being cycled through?

I don't see the problem on PowerShell Core v6.1.0-preview.3 / PSReadLine v2.0.0-beta2.

Can you update to the latest PS Core version and/or PSReadLine version (`Install-Module -Name PSReadLine -AllowPrerelease` from an elevated session) and see if you still have the problem?

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body: I think the issue is actually that OP is expecting the ability to select multiple options?

comments.author: mklement0
lzybkr
comments.body: This was fixed in PSReadLine 2.0.0-beta1. Beta2 is included with the current preview of PowerShell, or you can install the beta as @mklement0 suggests.

title: Selection does not work properly when completing arguments
